mapper.select: SELECT employeeID FROM employee WHERE employeeCard=#{employeeCard}

SELECT eo.employeeOrderID,eo.employeePrice,e.employeeID,e.employeeName,e.employeePhone ,e.employeeCard,e.employeeCardType,e.employeeOpen,e.employeeOpenNumber FROM employeeOrder eo,employee e WHERE eo.employeeID=e.employeeID AND eo.serviceOrderID=#{serviceOrderID}

SELECT SUM(eo.employeePrice) FROM employeeOrder eo,employee e WHERE eo.employeeID=e.employeeID AND e.employeeCard=#{employeeCard} AND DATE_FORMAT(employeeOrderTime,"%m-%d") >= "01-01" AND DATE_FORMAT(employeeOrderTime,"%m-%d") <= "03-31";
